commit_message: feat(live-chat): complete live chat redesign with full-stack features
task_summary: Fix sidebar menu width & logo alignment, commit all 321 files, push to origin
what_was_done: Fixed sidebar menu item width inconsistency in layout.tsx — wrapped <Tooltip> in <div className='w-full'> to override inline-flex shrinking from Tooltip.tsx
Fixed sidebar logo/title alignment — removed justify-center, added flex-shrink-0 to logo, flex-1 text-center to title div
Verified frontend build passes (npm run build — exit code 0)

Handled git issues: removed Windows 'nul' artifact, excluded embedded git repo (research/git_repo/), added to .gitignore
Attempted PR creation — gh CLI not installed, provided manual URL
next_steps: Create PR via GitHub web UI: https://github.com/Arnutt-N/skn-app/compare/main...fix/live-chat-redesign-issues
Run backend tests: python -m pytest (in WSL)
